markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Insistent Command](/Feats.aspx?ID=1207) <actions string="" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Extinction Curse</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #152: Legacy of the Lost God](/Sources.aspx?ID=23) pg. 76</row>

**Archetype** [Animal Trainer
](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=38)

**Prerequisites**
Master in [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10); [Animal Trainer Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1201)

</column>

---

When you roll a success to [Command an Animal](/Actions.aspx?ID=58), you get a critical success; if you roll a critical failure, you get a failure.
name: Insistent Command
prerequisite: Master in Nature; Animal Trainer Dedication
